## Block.setOutput() method

Set whether this block returns a value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setOutput(newBoolean: boolean, opt_check?: string | string[] | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newBoolean | boolean | True if there is an output. |
|  opt\_check | string \| string\[\] \| null | _(Optional)_ Returned type or list of returned types. Null or undefined if any type could be returned (e.g. variable get). |

**Returns:**

void
